item.title: Fcysy Solar Christmas Lights Outdoor Decorations, Red and White Lollipop Outside Solar Powered Xmas Pathway Lights, Waterproof Christmas Yard Walkway Stake Lights for Holiday Lawn Garden Patio Décor
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 🍭 SOLAR POWERED & 8 MODES：Put the Christmas Lollipop stake lights outdoor and keep the switch “ON”, it will automatically charge during the day and light up at night. It only takes 4-5 hours to charge when fully charged, and work 6-8 hours. There are 8 Lighting Modes: combination, in ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:33:35 UTC – Details)



SOLAR POWERED & 8 MODES：Put the Christmas Lollipop stake lights outdoor and keep the switch “ON”, it will automatically charge during the day and light up at night. It only takes 4-5 hours to charge when fully charged, and work 6-8 hours. There are 8 Lighting Modes: combination, in waves, sequential, slogs, chasing/flash, slow fade, twinkle/flash and steady on. Note: the solar power is light control, the pathway lights will not light up with the daylight.
WATERPROOF & EASY TO INSTALL：Fcysy Lollipop Led Christmas Lights outdoor are IP44 waterproof which means it can stand with any weather condition. Easy to install, you can stake the Xmas lights to anywhere you want to decorate.
PERFECT CHRISTMAS DÉCOR OUTDOOR: Brighten your Garden with our classic solar lollipop lights. Solar Christmas lights outdoor waterproof can be used in pathway, walkway, and driveway, front yards, garden and lawn decoration. Share the warm Christmas atmosphere with your neighbors.
IDEAL CHRISTMAS GIFT: This cute and warm light up lollipop yard light is perfect gift for friends and family. It is a useful Christmas and holiday Day gift to decorate festival, can be placed anywhere outside your home to create perfect holiday atmosphere.

Price: $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:33:35 UTC – Details)

item.title: Christmas Decorations Solar Stake Lights, 8 Pack Solar Christmas Pathway Lights Outdoor Waterproof with 8 Modes, Color-Changing Outdoor Christmas Decoration for Yard Patio Lawn Walkway Garden
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) [SOLAR CHRISTMAS STAKE LIGHTS] Set of 8 exquisite outdoor solar Christmas decorations boast of 4 shapes of snowflake, reindeer, Xmas tree and stars, featuring 4-changing colors and 8 lighting modes. The outdoor garden decor will give off a vivid and warm light better decorating your yard, and further bringing you ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $32.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:29:35 UTC – Details)



[SOLAR CHRISTMAS STAKE LIGHTS] Set of 8 exquisite outdoor solar Christmas decorations boast of 4 shapes of snowflake, reindeer, Xmas tree and stars, featuring 4-changing colors and 8 lighting modes. The outdoor garden decor will give off a vivid and warm light better decorating your yard, and further bringing you a colorful festival atmosphere!
[SOLAR POWERED & LONG WORK TIME] These Christmas pathway lights are solar powered, no need for cables or plugs. Large solar panel equipped with 800mAh high-capacity battery can work for more than 10 hours after being fully charged in sunlight. Christmas decorations outdoor yard stakes are definitely the best alternative for outdoor decorations for the sake of energy conservation. Zero electricity costs, save your money.
[EASY INSTALLATION & USE] No extra operations! Just connect these solar lights parts and stake, then insert into the ground. Please note turn on switch before both recharging and using. Really perfect solar Christmas decorations for the pathway, driveway, patio, backyard, walkway and outdoor landscape lighting to add a warm atmosphere throughout the whole night.
[HIGH QUALITY & ALL WEATHER READY] Outdoor Christmas decorations are more durable being made of ABS material with 8 sturdy stakes. All parts are IP65 waterproof enabled, suitable for both indoor and outdoor using without any worry of water ingress or damage. It works well in hot or cold weather, so you can safely put the lights outdoors, such as garden, yard, patio, pathway.
[AMAZING GIFT & AFTER SALES] These Christmas solar pathway lights are perfect Christmas gifts for mom, dad, husband, wife or friends. They will be amazed at how beautiful they look. The packaging of the solar garden decoration have been enhanced for your gift. If there are any problems with the product or any suggestions for us, please feel free to contact us.

5
Price: $32.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:29:35 UTC – Details)

item.content:encoded:
Price: $27.89
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:20:48 UTC – Details)



【Solar Powered & ATUO ON/OFF】Make sure to turn on the switch durning your first use, and let the solar pannel under direct sunlight. During the day, this solar garden light will automatically absorb the energy from the sun for about 8-10 hours, and at night, the solar watering can light will automatically light up for about 8-10 hours.
【Easy to Assemable】Solar stake lights only require 4 stakes and watring can to be screwed togethe, which is more convenient,and will be a nice outdoor decor for your patio, lawn,pathway, or garden.
【Perfect Outdoor Gift】This watering can solar lights is a perfect gift for Thanksgiving, Christmas, Mother’s Day, Father’s Day, Birthday Gift, Gardening gift.
【Attentive Service】We carefully check whether each light has poor contact before delivery, and ensure that every customer receives a garden lamp that can be used normally. If you have any questions, please contact us and our team will get back to you within 12 hours.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

From the brand

Light Bulbs

Outdoor LED Spotlight

Outdoor Lamp

EDISHINE has been focusing on the unity of practicality and decorativeness. Dedicated to banish the darkness and bring light to millions of families, while making your living space more beautiful and cozy. Specializing in indoor and outdoor lighting fixtures such as floor lamps, pendant lamps, table lamps, ceiling lamps, wall lamps, floodlights and more, meeting all your lighting needs from spacious front door to narrow bedside table.

【Flexible & Stable】Equipped with 6ft SJTW 18/3C extension cord, this outdoor plug in flood light is flexible enough to offer greater installation range without extra extension cord, easy for you to plug it into any polarized outlet; the included ground stake helps to keep fixture more stable
【Easy to Install & Adjustable Head】Just use the screw and nut cap to connect the ground stake, then put your bulb (not included) into the socket; you can adjust the direction of the flood light head by adjusting the screw to change the direction of the light, meet your different illumination needs
【E26 Socket】 E26 base only supports maximum of 150W PAR38 bulbs (bulbs not included); with high quality ceramic lamp base, our outdoor flood light fixture is high temperature resistance and durable, eliminating the hassle of frequent bulb replacement and saving your money
【Wide Application & Warranty】The outdoor flood light holders have passed the wet location test, can be used in humid environments and weather, ideal for yard, patio, flag, holiday decor; UL listed and 1-Year Warranty provided, our service team is always glad to help you within 24 hours





EDISHINE is a professional manufacturer specializing in Home Improvement and Indoor & Outdoor Lightings. Our primary aim is to provide you and other valuable members with higher quality products, A satisfying shopping experience is amongst our top priorities.

Outdoor Light Socket

Decorate Your Yard

Heavily weatherproof and waterproof performance floodlights made of sturdy material with shock-resistant closed lens housing that can withstand rain, snow, sleet, dirt, and dust in the outdoors.

120° Adjustable neck allows for the proper angle without the hassle repositioning.

Warm Tips:

This outdoor light does not contain bulbs, only par38 bulbs are used to ensure the waterproofness of the light.

  • Specification:
  • Input Voltage:120Vac, 60Hz
  • Waterproof:IP65
  • Meterial:Die-cast Aluminum
  • Recommended bulb type: par38 bulb (max 150W)

Read more




Flexible Angle

The Head of outdoor flood spotlight could be adjusted up to 120°，while if you want to adjust its angle, just loosen the nut, adjust the angle, and then tighten it.

Heavy Duty Cord

6 ft SJTW 18/3C heavy duty extension cord and the standard ground plug allow it to install directly instead of complex wiring, just plug it in in seconds and then enjoy your new yard after night falls.

Suitable for Any Weather

Only par38 bulbs with E26 base, maximum power 150W. The par38 bulb can be tightly fitted with the waterproof rubber ring to avoid the flooding of the outdoor light cocket.

Read more

Product Description

21in 12Pack Candy Cane Christmas Pathway Markers Lights with Stake

8 Models

Christmas candy cane pathway lights modes include fixed, blinking / flashing, slowly fading, chase / flashing, wave, combination, sequence, and progressive.

Red Light

Upgraded red and white candy lights come with 2 different styles of Christmas pendants (snowman and star), and the red lights are more cozy

Easy to Install

you just need to insert the stakes into the candy cane tubes, secure the cane lights firmly and choose the right spacing for the cane lights respectively.

IP44 Waterproof

These candy cane lights are mains powered, remains safe and luminous in rainy and snowy days, cast a classic Christmas silhouette.

Light Color
red and white multicolor none

Power Supply
plug in plug in none

12 pack Christmas outdoor decor: Each light up candy canes 21 inches high with 6 LEDs, space between each candy light: 50 cm/19.7 inches, plug lead length 3 meters/9.8 feet, total length 7.5 meters/24.6 feet, including 72 LED bulbs. With IP44 waterproof rating, lighted candy canes outdoor are suitable for indoor and outdoor Christmas decorations, and can withstand rain, sun or snow without worrying about short circuit or weather damage when using.
8 Adjustment Modes: Candy cane led lights can be adjusted by adjusting the buttons on the configured adapter to meet your needs for different holidays and different lighting effects.Christmas candy cane pathway lights plugged into the power supply, press the controller to adjust the mode, once you press the controller, 8 modes can be automatically switched.
Easy Installation: The candy cane yard lights come with sturdy stakes, you just need to insert the stakes into the candy cane tubes, secure the cane lights firmly and choose the right spacing for the cane lights respectively. Each light set comes with end-to-end plugs and stackable plugs that can be connected to up to multiple sets, giving you more options to decorate your yard!
Multiple scene: Sidewalk Candy cane lights can be placed neatly on the ground, in snowdrifts, in potted plants, or hung on fences, handrails, eaves, windowsills and mantels, or even decorate your Christmas tree.Light up candy canes outdoor are also great for creative gift-giving, send your kids to your elders and they will surely have a memorable Christmas day.

Easy to Install

you just need to insert the stakes into the candy cane tubes, secure the cane lights firmly and choose the right spacing for the cane lights respectively.

IP44 Waterproof

These candy cane lights are mains powered, remains safe and luminous in rainy and snowy days, cast a classic Christmas silhouette.

Product Description

C9 LED Multicolor Christmas Lights-4 Pack

7Ft Outdoor Christmas Pathway Stake Lights

Material: Plastic

Total length: 6.5 FT

Light length: 4.5 FT

Stakes Quantity: 4

Number of Lights: 4

Bulb Wattage: 0.6 Watt

Lighting Color: Warm White

End-to-End Connectable: Connectable Multiple Strands

Warm Tips Avoiding plug walkway stake lights in hard groud To prevent damaging to bottom accessories of stakes. IP44 waterproof C9 multicolor driveway markers Christmas lights Please avoiding to outdoor use in windy or stormy weather.

C9 LED ENERGY SAVING

Energy efficient LED bulbs reduce power needs by up to 90%. Excellent heat dissipation and flicker free lighting than incandescent string lights; long lifespan up to 50,000 hours.

SAFETY UL LISTED GUARANTY

IP44 waterproof level & UL Listed for outdoor & indoor use; Bulbs are virtually unbreakable, and colors never fade, chip or crack. The colorful Christams lights and a strong Christmas atmosphere will be the envy to your neighbor.

CHRISTMAS PATHWAY MARKER LIGHTS

C9 Traditional Christmas lights outdoor decorations lawn lights pathway lights imbue happiness and an exciting Christmas for your friends and families.!Keep Christmas spirit going well by illuminating your life.

【Safety Convenient & Practical】： 6″ lead with male plug, 12″ spacing between LED multicolor bulbs, 6″ tail with female connector.The male plug contains a spare fuse. 0.6Watt/Bulbs (totals 8bulbs).Each set LED multicolor Christmas pathway stake lights outdoor 2.4 watts, can connect up to 180 sets holiday pathway string lights(Max 432 watts) plug in and enjoy it.

SOLAR POWERED: This garden solar outdoor light used with a solar panel, powered by a solar battery charging system that supports 7 hours operations after fully charged. Auto Turn on/off.
EASY TO INSTALL: With garden stake stand, press the stake into the soil and keep the switch is in “AUTO” position. Just press it to somewhere you want. No wiring or external electricity required.
MOON SHAPE DECOR: Made of stainless steel and crackle glass, the garden light is great for decorating your pathway, garden, lawn, patio or courtyard, with waterproof warm white LED.

KITVONA Outdoor Sunflower Light Solar Garden Decor for Garden, Back Yard, Grave Decoration, Lawn Yard Ornaments

Specification: Material: Plastic, Fabric Size: 26 Inches Weight: 300g Package include: 2 x 26″ Sunflower Stakes

Sunflower Solar Decorative Light (2 Pack)Order yours today!

Do you want to make your garden more attractive?

Kitvona solar garden light quickly install by pushing this lights into the ground wherever you want a beautiful illuminated decoration, perfect as path lights and in-ground lights Suitable for the Garden, Trees, Flowers, Flowerbed, Fence, Walkway, Bird bath, farmhouse porch decor, lawn fountain, this garden solar lights Does it all.

Design with warm LED, illuminates paths and porches while showing off the beautiful sunflower.

Simply press the switch to on position, easy installation, No wiring required. Safe for indoor or outdoor decoration use.

Glow in Dark

Kitvona decorative solar garden lights charge during day (ensure the switch is in ‘ON’ position) and turn on automatically at night for up to 8 hours when full charged.

Gorgeous & Realistic

Kitvona solar sunflower light is idea for decorating your backyard, special for spring, summer, fall, winter decorations. also a gift idea for Mom, women friend, grandma.

Maximize Available Sunlight

Polysilicon solar panels used, still work in a rainy day-waterproof. Kitvona patio decor light built in a 600MAH rechargeable battery to keep working a long time.

Easy to install

Installation without tools, convenient and quick. Just insert the sunflower yard decor stakes into soil or ground wherever you want a nice illuminated garden decoration.
